casebody.data:
John CLARK, Respondent,
v.
St. Louis METAL and Recycling Company, Inc., and Demetrious Hester, Appellants. No. ED 106187 Missouri Court of Appeals, Eastern District, DIVISION TWO. Filed: April 16, 2019 ATTORNEYS FOR APPELLANT: Richard J. Magee, 200 South Hanley Road, Suite 500, Clayton, MO 63105. ATTORNEYS FOR RESPONDENT: Sean M. Flaherty, 301 Main Street, P. O. Box 800, Hillsboro, MO 63050. Before Philip M. Hess, P.J. and Robert G. Dowd, Jr. and Mary K. Hoff, JJ.

ORDER

PER CURIAM.

St. Louis Metal and Recycling Company, Inc. and Demetrious Hester ("Appellants") appeal from a judgment denying their motion to amend the judgment entered against them and in favor of John Clark following a bench trial. Finding no obvious abuse of discretion, we affirm.

An opinion would have no precedential value nor serve any jurisprudential purpose. The parties have been furnished with a memorandum for their information only, setting forth the reasons for this order pursuant to Rule 84.16(b).
